title: Line Mechanics
description:
The Company 
  
As a well-established contracting company with long term work. We pride ourselves on excellent services provided to our clients and maintain high health and safety standards.
  
About the role:
This is a permanent role open to NZ citizens and persons holding an essential skills work visa for Line mechanics residing in NZ. 
  
The position involves being part of a highly specialized team where you will be constructing and maintaining overhead power lines for low and high voltage electrical distribution as well as assisting on projects. 
  
Here is the opportunity to become part of a dedicated and passionate team, within a supportive working environment. All gear and equipment is provided for the role, and if you are interested in developing your skills there is a wide range of opportunities.
  
Skills and Experience:
 
Must be a qualified Distribution Line Mechanic with previous industry experience
EWRB registered
Must have a minimum of 3 years experience in a similar environment
Enjoy working in the outdoors
Must be confident working at heights
Committed to producing quality work and exhibiting tidy and methodical work practices
Able to complete tasks independently but also work well as part of a team
Excellent communication skills and customer service skills
A strong emphasis on Health and Safety and sustainable work practices.
Applicants must be capable of obtaining a Class 2 drivers license or currently hold one.
